front.title: Believing NSEC records in the DNS root.

abstract.t: This document describes a method to generate negative answers from NSEC records for the special case of the DNS root. This improves performance; the resolver can answer immediatly, and does not need to query the root. It also cuts down on the so-called "junk" queries.
